DataElement.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study regarding which the FDA issued an order to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it._The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened._Set of consecutive values of an ordered base datatype of the type TS.

When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it._The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical study status designating the study regarding which the FDA issued an order to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

Concepts.definition: A clinical study status designating that an order has been issued to a study sponsor to delay a proposed investigation or to suspend an ongoing one. When a proposed study is placed on clinical hold, subjects may not be given the investigational product as part of the study. When an ongoing study is placed on clinical hold, no new subjects may be recruited to the study and placed on the investigational product. Subjects already in the study have to stop receiving therapy involving the investigational agent unless the FDA specifically permits it.

Property.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)
